courses.title: Beginner Guitar Essentials
courses.description: Learn the basics of guitar, including chords, strumming, and simple songs.

courses.title: Piano for Beginners
courses.description: Start your piano journey with essential music theory and hands-on practice.

courses.title: Mastering Music Production
courses.description: Produce studio-quality tracks using industry-standard software and techniques.

courses.description: Learn rhythm, coordination, and basic drumming patterns to build a strong foundation.

courses.title: Vocal Training for Beginners
courses.description: Develop your voice with exercises on pitch, tone, and breath control.
